Hi! This is my first post so forgive me if I'm uploading wrong.

I just recently got the game and am doing great figuring everything out, except for what the title states. I am on a laptop so I cannot activate the mousewheel the way the manual suggests, and I can't find any recent discussions, guides, or key bindings that help- I'm on v1.12.5.3190(OSX). It's been fine for a while but I'm building a satellite for Mun and it's impossible to perfect the small details as well as getting a cohesive view of the vessel without being able to adjust my camera zoom. 

Please let me know up-to-date control schemes for this or possible solutions. I'll try to answer any questions needed. 

(Also is there an all-encompassing document of helpful equations, rates, constants, etc? I'm exhausted of just eyeballing half of my steps)

Thanks! <<<3

Hello @weeping_willow!

I had the same problem using my laptop.  I re-mapped the zoom in/out keys to my ' - ' and ' = ' keys.  I chose those keys because they didn't seem to already be assigned to anything else.

To re-assign key functions, you'll need to go to settings, and find the entries for zoom in and zoom out.  If you are not able to find the screen where you can re-assign keys, report back.  I don't recall the exact settings screen you need to go to at the moment..
